text: The Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania (/ˈhwɔːrtən/ WHAWR-tən; also known as Wharton Business School, the Wharton School, and Wharton) is the business school of the University of Pennsylvania, United States. Wharton School is believe to be the world's oldest collegiate business school. == References == Category:Colleges and universities in Pennsylvania Category:1881 establishments Category:Philadelphia
title: Wharton School
